about_the_game:
TRUEM is a revolutionary racing game from HOLGEAR GAMES that takes the low poly genre to a new level of realism! Forget about banal arcades - TRUEM combines stylish minimalism and a powerful physics model to give you genuine driving emotions. You will experience dynamic races in unique cars from different eras: from legendary sports cars of the 80s to modern racing monsters, from powerful sedans to extreme SUVs. Each car is unique and conveys the spirit of its time.

In TRUEM you can conquer a variety of tracks, each of which is created for specific purposes. Improve your results on technical circuit tracks, set acceleration records on the drag racing track and hone your drifting skills in the spacious port area. Each map is a unique challenge and an opportunity to test your skills to the max.

Game Features:

· Free Race Mode — Improve your skills alone or compete with opponents on tracks that challenge even experienced racers.

· Career — Go from a beginner to a champion, overcoming various challenges, earning points and improving your results.

· Realism on the Unity 5 engine — every detail in the car’s behavior is carefully designed to make you feel like a real racer.

HOLGEAR GAMES studio is not just creating a game — we live cars and are constantly improving our project, adding new cars, tracks and features to make your journey through the world of racing unforgettable.

Join the TRUEM community on social networks to stay up to date with the latest updates and be the first to know about new features and content. Add TRUEM to your wishlist and become part of a new era of racing simulators!
